sentences.en: A tasteful flavour consisting of Vanilla, Walnut & Honey has been added.
sentences.cn: 香草 、 胡桃 及 蜂蜜精华,齿颊留香.

sentences.en: Add a few drops of vanilla essence.
Add a teaspoon of vanilla extract to the juice.
sentences.cn: 在果汁中加一茶匙香草香精.

sentences.en: Chocolate and vanilla have different flavours.
sentences.cn: 巧克力与香草精味道不同.

sentences.en: He used to love milk flavoured with vanilla.
sentences.cn: 他过去常爱喝带香草味的牛奶.

sentences.en: I added a dollop of vanilla ice cream to the pie.
sentences.cn: 我在馅饼中加了一块香草冰淇淋。

sentences.en: I added a dollop of vanilla ice-cream to the pie.
sentences.cn: 我在馅饼里加了一块香草冰激凌。

sentences.en: I would like two vanilla ice creams, please.
sentences.cn: 请给我来两杯香草冰淇淋.

sentences.en: No food that I could dream of seemed half so utterly delicious as vanilla wafers.
sentences.cn: 我所梦想的任何食物都不如香草薄饼那么可口有味.

sentences.en: Nose: Ripe, juicy strawberry and raspberry aromas with delicate vanilla spice undertones.
sentences.cn: 气味: 成熟草莓汁和覆盆子的香气混合着细致优雅的香草香料的味道.

sentences.en: Orange Vanilla Lemon resides in Idaho.
sentences.cn: 橘子?香草?柠檬居住在爱达荷州.

sentences.en: Our vanilla ice cream is very good.
sentences.cn: 我们的香草冰淇淋非常不错.

sentences.en: The city is pretty much plain vanilla.
We have vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry.
sentences.cn: 我们有香草的 、 巧克力的和草莓的.

sentences.en: Well, there's chocolate and coffee and a little vanilla.
sentences.cn: 好的.这儿有巧克力冰淇淋、咖啡冰淇淋和一点香草的.

trans.tran_cn: 香草的，香草味的，相对没有新意的，普通的
香子兰，香草，香子兰荚，香子兰精，香草精
trans.tran_en: a substance used to give a special taste to ice cream, cakes etc, made from the beans of a tropical plant
